content:
{% set company_data = frappe.get_list("Company", filters={"name": doc.company}, fields=["*"]) %} {% set company_address = frappe.get_list("Address", filters={"name": doc.billing_address}, fields=["*"]) %} {% set supplier_details = frappe.get_doc("Supplier", doc.supplier) %} {% set supplier_address = frappe.get_list("Address", filters={"name":doc.supplier_address}, fields=["*"]) %} {% macro display_data(data) %} {% if data is not none %} {{ data }} {% endif %} {% endmacro %}

P.O No: {{display_data(doc.name)}}

PURCHASE ORDER

Please Write Purchase Order no. in Bill Copy

Date : {{display_data(doc.transaction_date)}}

Invoice To

{% for details in company_address %}
{{display_data(details.address_line1)}} {{display_data(details.address_line2)}} {{display_data(details.city)}} - {{display_data(details.pincode)}}
{% endfor %}

080-416927014, 4124 1281, 98442 61624

{% for details in company_address %}

{{display_data(details.email_id)}}

{% endfor %} {{display_data(doc.company_gstin)}}

Supplier Phone : {% for data in supplier_address %} {{display_data(data.phone)}} {% endfor %}

Dispatch To : {{display_data(doc.shipping_address)}}

Name: {{ display_data(supplier_details.supplier_name) }}
{% for data in supplier_address %} {% if data.address_line2 %} {{ display_data(data.address_line1) }}
{% endif %} {% if data.address_line2 %} {{ display_data(data.address_line2) }}
{% endif %} {{ display_data(data.city) }}-{{ display_data(data.pincode) }} {% endfor %}

Supplier`s Ref/Order no.
CD %
{{ display_data(doc.additional_discount_percentage) }}
RD / MTR
{{display_data(doc.custom_rdmtrrate_discount_per_meter)}}
SNR
{{display_data(doc.custom_snrsuper_net_rate)}}

Dispatch Through :

{{ display_data(doc.custom_despatch_through) }}

Name of the Agency
{{doc.custom_name_of_agency}}

Terms of Delivery

{{display_data(doc.terms)}}
name: Purchase Order

content:
{% set company_data = frappe.db.get_list("Address", filters={"name" : doc.billing_address}, fields=["*"]) %} {% set customer_data = frappe.db.get_list("Address", filters={"name" : doc.supplier_address}, fields=["*"]) %} {% set return_invoice_data = frappe.db.get_list("Purchase Invoice", filters={"name": doc.return_against}, fields=["*"]) %} {% set pan_data = frappe.db.get_list("Company", filters = {"name" : doc.company}, fields = ["*"]) %} {% macro display_data(data) %} {% if data is not none %} {{ data }} {% endif %} {% endmacro %}
GSTIN : {{display_data(doc.company_gstin)}}
Debit Note
MEZZO APPARELS PRIVATE LIMITED
{% for data in company_data %}
{{ display_data(data.address_line1) }} {{ display_data(data.city) }}-{{ display_data(data.pincode) }}
{% endfor %}
PAN: {% for data in pan_data %}{{display_data(data.pan)}}{% endfor %}
Tel. : {% for details in company_data %} {{ display_data(details.phone) }} {% endfor %} Email : {% for details in company_data %} {{display_data(details.email_id)}} {% endfor %}
Party Details :
{% for details in customer_data %} {{display_data(details.address_line1)}} {{display_data(details.city)}} - {{display_data(details.pincode)}} {% endfor %}
Party PAN              :
   ABFFM9868G
Party Mobile No    :
{% for details in customer_data %}
   {{display_data(details.phone)}}
{% endfor %}
GSTIN / UIN           :
{% for details in customer_data %}
   {{display_data(details.gstin)}}
{% endfor %}
Remarks                :
   {{display_data(doc.remarks)}}
Dr. Note No.          :
     {{ display_data(doc.name) }}
Dr. Note Date        :
     {{ display_data(doc.posting_date) }}
Org. Inv. No.          :
     {{ display_data(doc.return_against) }}
Org. Inv. Date        :
{% for data in return_invoice_data %}
     {{ display_data(data.posting_date) }}
{% endfor %}
GR/RR No.             :
     
Transport               :
    {{ display_data(doc.mode_of_transport) }}
Vehicle No.            :
    {{display_data(doc.vehicle_no)}}
Station                   :
   
E-Way Bill No.       :
   
#BILL REF NO :
name: Debit Note
Sales Order

content:
{% set email_and_website = frappe.get_list("Company", filters={"name": doc.company}, fields=["*"]) %} {% set company_address = frappe.get_list("Address", filters={"name": doc.company_address}, fields=["*"]) %} {% set customer_address = frappe.get_list("Address", filters={"name": doc.customer_address}, fields=["*"]) %} {% set customer_shippin_address = frappe.get_list("Address", filters={"name": doc.shipping_address_name}, fields=["*"]) %} {% set delivery_data = frappe.db.get_list(doctype="Delivery Note", filters={"against_sales_invoice": doc.name}) %} {% set delivery_note_names = [] %} {% for details in delivery_data %} {% set _ = delivery_note_names.append(details.name) %} {% endfor %} {% set fetch_e_Waybill_Log_data = frappe.db.get_list("e-Waybill Log", filters={"reference_name": doc.name}, fields=["*"]) %} {% macro display_data(data) %} {% if data is not none %} {{ data }} {% endif %} {% endmacro %} {% if doc.irn %} {% set invoice_data = frappe.db.get_list("e-Invoice Log", filters={"irn": doc.irn}, fields=["acknowledgement_number", "signed_qr_code"]) %} {% endif %}
📍 {{display_data(doc.company)}}
📍
{% for data in company_address %}
{{ display_data(data.address_line1) }} {{ display_data(data.city) }} - {{ display_data(data.pincode) }}
{% endfor %}
📱
{% for data in company_address %}
Office - {{ display_data(data.custom_telephone_number) }}
{% endfor %}
📧
{% for company in email_and_website %}
{{ display_data(company.email) }} {{ display_data(company.website) }}
{% endfor %}
TAX INVOICE
({{ display_data(doc.invoice_copy) }})
GSTIN: {{ display_data(doc.company_gstin) }}
Buyer:

{{ display_data(doc.customer) }}

Address:
{% for data in customer_address %}

{{ display_data(data.address_line1) }} - {{ display_data(data.pincode) }} {{ display_data(data.state) }}

{% endfor %}
GST No:

{{ display_data(doc.billing_address_gstin) }}

State Code:
{% for data in customer_address %}

{{ display_data(data.gst_state_number) }}

{% endfor %}
E-mail:
{% for data in customer_address %}

{{ display_data(data.email_id) }}

{% endfor %}
Mob No:
{% for data in customer_address %}

{{ display_data(data.phone) }}

{% endfor %}
Ph No:

07752403299

Invoice No:

{{ display_data(doc.name) }}

Dated:

{{ display_data(doc.posting_date) }}

Terms of Payment:
{% if doc.payment_terms_template is not none %}

{{ doc.payment_terms_template }}

{% else %}

{% endif %}
Ship To:

{{ display_data(doc.customer) }}

Address:
{% for data in customer_shippin_address %}

{{ display_data(data.address_line1) }} - {{ display_data(data.pincode) }} {{ display_data(data.state) }}

{% endfor %}
GST No:
{% for data in customer_shippin_address %}

{{ display_data(data.gstin) }}

{% endfor %}
State Code:
{% for data in customer_shippin_address %}

{{ display_data(data.gst_state_number) }}

{% endfor %}
E-mail:
{% for data in customer_shippin_address %}

{{ display_data(data.email_id) }}

{% endfor %}
Mob No:
{% for data in customer_shippin_address %}

{{ display_data(data.phone) }}

{% endfor %}
Ph No:

07752403299

Transport:
{% if doc.transporter is not none %}

{{ doc.transporter }}

{% else %}

{% endif %}
L R No.&Dt:

{{display_data(doc.lr_no)}} - {{display_data(doc.lr_date)}}

Place of Supply:

{{ display_data(doc.place_of_supply) }}

Destination:
{% for data in customer_address %}

{{ display_data(data.city) }}

{% endfor %}
# Box/Bag:

{{display_data(doc.custom_box)}} BOX

E-Way Bill:

{% for details in fetch_e_Waybill_Log_data %} {{ display_data(details.name) }} {% endfor %}

DC No.:

{{ delivery_note_names | join(', ') }}

IRN:
{{ display_data(doc.irn) }}
Ack No.
{% for data in invoice_data %} {{display_data(data.acknowledgement_number)}} {% endfor %}
Date :
{% set fetch_ewaybill = frappe.db.get_list("e-Waybill Log", filters = {"reference_name": doc.name}, fields=["*"]) %} {% for data in fetch_ewaybill %}
{{display_data(data.created_on)}}
{% endfor %}
footer:
{% set company_bank_details = frappe.db.get_list("Bank Account", filters={"Company": doc.company}, fields=["*"]) %} {% macro display_data(data) %} {% if data is not none %} {{ data }} {% endif %} {% endmacro %} {% set invoice_data = frappe.db.get_list("e-Invoice Log", filters={"irn": doc.irn}, fields=["acknowledgement_number", "signed_qr_code"]) %}
{% for tax_data in doc.taxes %}
Add   :   {{ display_data(tax_data.description) }}             @         {{ display_data(tax_data.rate) }} %
{% endfor %}
Add   :   Rounded Off(+)
{{ display_data(doc.rounded_total) }}
{% for tax_data in doc.taxes %}
{{ display_data(tax_data.tax_amount) }}
{% endfor %}
{{ display_data(doc.rounding_adjustment) }}
{{ display_data(doc.in_words) }}
GRAND TOTAL
{{ display_data(doc.rounded_total) }}
Notes
BANK DETAILS: {% for details in company_bank_details %} {{ display_data(doc.company) }} {{ display_data(details.bank) }} BANK {% endfor %}
A/C NO. {% for details in company_bank_details %} {{ display_data(details.bank_account_no) }}, IFS CODE: {{ display_data(details.branch_code) }} {% endfor %}
Terms and Condition
{{ display_data(doc.terms) }}
QR Code {% if invoice_data %} {% for data in invoice_data %} {% if data.signed_qr_code %}
{% else %}
{% endif %} {% endfor %} {% else %}
{% endif %}
Receiver`s Signature






For {{ display_data(doc.company) }} Authorized Signatory
name: Sales Invoice
